  • Constructor Details

    • Bug

      public Bug​(city.cs.engine.World world, int strength, int side, city.cs.engine.Shape bugLeftShape, city.cs.engine.Shape bugRightShape)
      Creates a dynamic body - Bug
      Parameters:
      world - World the body is created in
      strength - Bug's strength (it also determines its health and BodyImage)
      side - Side the Bug is looking when created (0 - left, 1 - right)
      bugLeftShape - Shape of the Bug looking left
      bugRightShape - Shape of the Bug looking right

    • getStartPosition

      public org.jbox2d.common.Vec2 getStartPosition()
      Returns the midpoint of Bug's movement

      Bug can move X horizontal distance from this point, after that it changes direction

      Returns:
      midpoint of Bug's movement
